testResults.name: C:\Users\maxime\Programs\on_chain_riddle\Frontend\src\presentation\components\RiddleGame.test.tsx

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Initial State Given a new useWallet hook, When initialized, Then it should start with disconnected state
assertionResults.title: Given a new useWallet hook, When initialized, Then it should start with disconnected state

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Wallet Connection Given MetaMask is available, When connecting wallet successfully, Then it should update state with address and chainId
assertionResults.title: Given MetaMask is available, When connecting wallet successfully, Then it should update state with address and chainId

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Wallet Connection Given MetaMask request fails, When connecting wallet, Then it should set error state
assertionResults.title: Given MetaMask request fails, When connecting wallet, Then it should set error state

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Wallet Connection Given MetaMask is not installed, When connecting wallet, Then it should set appropriate error
assertionResults.title: Given MetaMask is not installed, When connecting wallet, Then it should set appropriate error

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Wallet Disconnection Given a connected wallet, When disconnecting, Then it should reset to initial state
assertionResults.title: Given a connected wallet, When disconnecting, Then it should reset to initial state

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Event Listeners Given useWallet hook mounts, When initialized, Then it should set up event listeners
assertionResults.title: Given useWallet hook mounts, When initialized, Then it should set up event listeners

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Event Listeners Given useWallet hook unmounts, When cleanup occurs, Then it should remove event listeners
assertionResults.title: Given useWallet hook unmounts, When cleanup occurs, Then it should remove event listeners

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Account Change Handling Given account changes in MetaMask, When accountsChanged event fires, Then it should update address
assertionResults.title: Given account changes in MetaMask, When accountsChanged event fires, Then it should update address

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Account Change Handling Given all accounts are disconnected, When accountsChanged event fires with empty array, Then it should disconnect wallet
assertionResults.title: Given all accounts are disconnected, When accountsChanged event fires with empty array, Then it should disconnect wallet

assertionResults.fullName: useWallet Hook Network Change Handling Given network changes in MetaMask, When chainChanged event fires, Then it should reload page
assertionResults.title: Given network changes in MetaMask, When chainChanged event fires, Then it should reload page

assertionResults.fullName: Validation Utils validateEthereumAddress Given a valid Ethereum address, When validating, Then it should return true
assertionResults.title: Given a valid Ethereum address, When validating, Then it should return true

assertionResults.fullName: Validation Utils validateEthereumAddress Given an invalid Ethereum address, When validating, Then it should return false
assertionResults.title: Given an invalid Ethereum address, When validating, Then it should return false

assertionResults.fullName: Validation Utils validateEthereumAddress Given a null or undefined address, When validating, Then it should return false
assertionResults.title: Given a null or undefined address, When validating, Then it should return false
